description.riddleState: Solve the riddles below to reveal different aspects of my professional journey
description.solvedState: Cloud Engineer, Web Developer, and AI Automation Specialist

riddles.title: Cloud Engineering
riddles.riddle: I orchestrate containers, scale with ease, and keep your infrastructure running in the breeze. What AWS service am I?
riddles.hint: I manage Kubernetes clusters in the Amazon cloud.
riddles.explanation: Cloud infrastructure is my specialty, particularly AWS EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service). I've designed scalable and resilient architectures for enterprise applications.

riddles.title: Web Development
riddles.riddle: I bring reactivity without the library, keeping state in sync across the UI. What modern framework am I?
riddles.hint: I'm built on React but add server-side rendering and more.
riddles.explanation: I specialize in Next.js development, creating performant web applications with server-side rendering, static site generation, and modern React patterns.

riddles.title: AI Automation
riddles.riddle: I process language naturally, complete your code, and generate images too. What AI technology am I?
riddles.hint: Large _____ Models are transforming how we interact with AI.
riddles.explanation: I implement Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT to automate processes, create intelligent systems, and enhance user experiences through natural language processing.

paragraphs: I'm a passionate Cloud Engineer and Web Developer with a strong background in technical support and automation. My journey in technology has been driven by a desire to solve complex problems with elegant, efficient solutions.

With experience across cloud platforms, web development, and AI integration, I bring a versatile skill set to every project. I'm particularly interested in leveraging AI tools to enhance workflows and create more efficient systems.

quote.text: Technology is most powerful when it empowers everyone. My goal is to build solutions that make complex systems accessible and efficient.
